After entering his [[Jinchūriki Forms#Initial Jinchūriki Form|initial jinchūriki form]], Naruto creates a giant [[Tailed Beast Chakra Arms|claw]] out of [[Kurama]]'s [[chakra]], and slashes the opponent. Afterwards, he enters his Version 2 state.
